DTMod:StackedDeckPower.NAME: Stacked Deck
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, Look at the top #b
cards of your draw pile and discard any of them.

DTMod:BondingPower.NAME: Bonding
DESCRIPTIONS: #yBonding, choose a powerful #yBonding effect to receive.

DTMod:CalculatedDefensePower.NAME: Calculated Defense
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce the damage from Weakened enemies by #b

DTMod:AdaptationPower.NAME: Adaptation
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you shuffle your deck, put ALL Innate cards into your hand.
